name: jdesrosiers/silex-conneg-provider
description: A silex service provider that provides tools for doing HTTP content negotiation.

suggest.jdesrosiers/silex-jms-serializer-provide: Use the conneg service to serialize responses and deserialize requests using JMS Serializer.
suggest.symfony/serializer: Use the conneg service to serialize responses and deserialize requests using the Symfony Serializer Component.
